alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grant and east central Hidalgo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Playas, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hachita Valley and Playas Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
